org.coniks.coniks_server

Class SignedTreeRoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.SignedTreeRoot

  • public class SignedTreeRoot
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a signed tree root, which is generated at the beginning of every epoch. Signed tree roots contain the current root node, the current and previous epochs, the hash of the previous STR, and its signature. Signed tree roots

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SignedTreeRoot(RootNode r, long ep, long prevEp, byte[] prevHash, byte[] sig, SignedTreeRoot p)
      Constructs a signed tree root containing the RootNode r, the signature sig, the previous epoch prevEp, the hash of the previous STR prevHash, the signature sig, and the previous STR in the chain p for epoch ep.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getEpoch()
      Gets this signed tree root's epoch.
      SignedTreeRoot getPrev()
      Gets the signed tree root preceding this signed tree root.
      long getPrevEpoch()
      Gets this signed tree root's previous epoch.
      byte[] getPrevSTRHash()
      Gets this signed tree root's previous epoch.
      RootNode getRoot()
      Gets this signed tree root's root node.
      byte[] getSignature()
      Gets this signed tree root's signature.
